game.name: Burger Chef Restaurant
game.description:
Not everyone dares to learn something new during their free time. However, you have showed trust on us and chosen to prepare this popular fast food item. In this one of the best cooking games for girls, you will get a chance to test your food skills and prepare highly scrumptious hamburgers in your own burger restaurant. No matter whether you are aware of how to handle a restaurant or not – you can play this brand new free online game to wear the crown of being the best chef of burgers. 

It will be really exciting to manage and control your own restaurant and complete all the burger orders timely in this one of the highly addictive and interesting games for girls. Your long awaited dream of opening a burger restaurant has come true, so don’t make any mistakes that could spoil the image of your establishment. With 180 levels, each level comes with some extra challenges and difficulties. Deal with them with full of confidence to win the leading burger chef championship in this cool HTML5 cooking game!

Apart from handing the responsibilities of an owner of the restaurant, you also have to take care of the job of a head chef, who is quite aware of the techniques on how to prepare delicious burger and serve it to his customers. Give them exactly they want – whether it’s extra tomatoes or two patties in this one of the best fast food games! Make your customers happy to ensure your win in this free online burger game! Enjoy three games modes: chef championship, time attack and career in this top burger restaurant game!! Good luck!!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Burger Chef Restaurant at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: CLICK ON THE RIGHT INGREDIENTS AS PER THE ORDER IMAGE TO MAKE THE BURGER
